text: Edit: changed my rating as I've watched the same ad twice now and it won't update my prisms. Can't be the internet connection as the whole ad shows without interruption! Really enjoy the game and the colours and graffixs are great but the ads after every game are super annoying! If I want more credits I'll watch an ad or at most every 3 games to keep the app free.

I love this; it is my favorite game to play! I've had the app for about 1-2 years now. I just hate that if the app gets uninstalled or I move to a new phone my data does not transfer so you have to start from the first level. But it's fine cuz I love rearranging the gradients anyway.

The game itself is beautiful, relaxing and fun. The app makes it frustrating. There's an ad after every puzzle, and they only take a few minutes to solve so it feels like you're constantly watching ads. It costs prisms to play each puzzle, and you only get enough per day to play a few puzzles so to get more you're watching more ads or paying to get more. This app is mostly about watching ads with a beautiful puzzle game in between.

Honestly, I enjoyed the game. It's extremely peaceful and whenever I play this game I think about what's going on in my head. However, I played the game for quite a while and I haven't gotten any ads but for now, I've gotten ads on every level I complete. It's extremely annoying and it will make me lose my focus on my thoughts. If I'm going to have ads after every level I complete, how am I going to complete the whole game? Honestly, I love this game so much as the graphics are amazing so are the colors. I hope you will remove this ads problem. I also recommend people who is stress and trying to cool down to play this game. I've completed about 400+ of them. Can't wait to complete the whole game. üòä

I like this game, but it's really annoying that you have to 'pay' for each level, in the little cone things, and every day only gives you four plays of NEW levels. Not to mention that you still spend a cone to replay a level you have already beaten. I just wasn't to play with colors, not be constantly microtaxed and wondering if I'll be able to play the next round or more retina when I want to play in the future to calm down.
There are far too many ads. I would rate it 5 stars but there is literally an ad after every level. It's so annoying to the point were I don't even want to play the game anymore.

Why does this game have a limit? This is stupid. I have deleted many games that also limit how much you can play in a certain amount of time. Terrible. Otherwise would rate 8/8 mate. I haven't deleted it because besides that very annoying flaw I love this game.

I used to love this game but they recently changed it so every single time you complete a level you get a 30 second unskippable ad. It's irritating. I play less and less. I don't mind ads on a free app, but these are SO long, after every single level and you can't skip.

To everyone complaining about ads...just buy a prism pack already! Problem solved and this game is worth much more than that small prism pack costs. This game is the ultimate game forcolor lovers. It is challenging without being frustrating and relaxing without ever being boring. I would recommend this game to anyone üíó‚ù§üíõüíöüíôüíú

Just brilliant! The only game I have, the only one I need. Simple, fun and calming. You get a knack for it and eventually it becomes almost mindless and very satisfying to do. Can be played offline, doesn't slow down or clog up my phone. Such a brilliant game!!! Thank you, devs!
Is there a bug on the top level board 7? I can't complete although my partner has confirmed it looks spot on. Otherwise a really excellent game, very good for mental health - anxiety especially.
Ads after every level is annoying. Did about 22 levels, wasted 10+ minutes of my life watching ads. Beat world averages pretty easily. Guess my eyes are ok.
It would be better without so many ads. I don't appreciate that my mute settings don't matter to the appropriate,  every ad comes on at volume, making this a game I can't play in a quiet place.

I use this app to help distract me from my anxiety. The colours are beautiful, the game is relaxing and you can go at your own pace - no pressure. It's free, and you only watch an ad when you want more coins

This is super creative! The level design is great and challenging. Only thing that bothers me a bit is the microtransaction. I think it should be like buying the full game to get 3-4 difficulties level (which can be played anytime without paying 'diamonds') and buy the expansion for the upcoming level/expansion stage.

Fun to play and I would like to buy a prism pack to disable adds, but since the one time it asked I have not been able to find the store again. I think perhaps it is a graphical glitch where I am missing a menu button. I am on an Essential phone that might not like whatever you are doing to claim full screen since it reserves the top bit for status bar around the camera. Other games and full screen apps work fine.

I love this game so much the graphics are great and it's so fun and it keeps me occupied in my free time. I'm always bored lmfao the only thing that I do these days is kpop and this game so.... Thank you‚ô°‚ô°

I am really enjoying this game, I don't even mind the daily limit (unless you buy more rounds) as it keeps me from playing to long. But the 30 SECOND LONG ADDs everytime you finish a round is tedious and irritating! I don't mind short interruptions, or the choice to watch longer adds to earn rounds/rewards, but I am on the brink of uninstalling this game rather than buying it as I do with most games I enjoy.

I love this game. Best way to see the color difference is with a dimish bright room. And brightness on phone turned up high.  Only downside is because how high you need the brightness your phone battery will begin to dwindle quickly. Grab a charger and play on(:

They reel you in with a beautiful beginner's level, and then the rest of the game is just ads and cash grabs. This would be well worth a dollar or more, but its blatant greediness means I can't stand to support it.

I love this game very much! At the beginning I wasn't too good at telling apart colours and hues that looked very similar. However, as I progressed through the levels, I found it much easier to know which colours go where. This game is very soothing and relaxing too!üíóüíó

I'll admit that I expected to get bored of this after a day, but I find myself still checking in each day!   As for the game, it's a simple but really pretty premise of arranging things according to their shade. Each day you get 12 tokens; each game requires 3; there are about 12 games per level and completing games gives you points to unlock more levels.  It's a fun little distraction, so I would certainly recommend it. I haven't noticed any glitches or general weirdness, so it's a 5 star rating for me!

The game is absolutely beautiful and is great for spending only a few minutes or a full hour. I have had a hard time of putting the game down since I installed it. There is nothing more satisfying then seeing the jumbled mess of colors come together so perfectly ‚ù§Ô∏è
The game itself is fine, but with app sound set to mute, the ad still freaking plays sound! Very obtrusive and incosiderate design. Hated that.

It takes me back to color and design class as an art major. Very impressed by the color layouts, deceptively difficult to tell how to arrange the color patterns as the levels get harder, but also so satisfying to finally see that tile slide into the right spot!
Have been addicted from the start. Great way to de-stress after a long day. If you don't want ads though just play offline... do this before opening the app though.
This app is so relaxing and challenging at the same time. There are fewer ads than most apps, and they're shorter...I mean, I need a break anyway. 5 second ads are nothing.
In game currency is bad. Forced to watch ads that pause background music. I use watch ads to gain prisms, why force ads after completing a level?

I love this game, it's so soothing and visually appealing! Although, it's a bummer that you get so few prisms when compared to the amount of prisms you get a day. I just really love this game and wish I had more time playing.

This game is nice but it's super annoying that if I accidentally open a past level, it automatically deducts a prism. The worst part is that the game often opens on a level I've finished, so this happens more than it should. Please fix this and I'll rate it higher.

Seriously...you expect me to watch a commercial every single puzzle? Who the hell thinks that sort of nonsense is relaxing? I was literally spending more time waiting for commercials than playing the actual game.
This game is great for my anxiety, so peaceful! With a blue light filter on it's great for relaxing before bed, helps me get to sleep. *Update* the constant ads are annoying!!
30 second adverts after EVERY round. I don't mind reasonable levels of adverts to play a game for free. This goes way too far and is about to be deleted. Shame as otherwise it's an excellent game.

Usually puzzle games tend to get a little frustrating so I generally just do something else, this game looked particularly pretty so I fogured I'd give it a shot and I'm so glad I did. The graphics are gorgeous, you can turn off the scores in the settings and the comments in the app itself are super positive! Also the gameplay remains relaxing even in the more difficult levels. Can't recommend enough.

Great game! If there was some relaxing music it would be great! And also some more statistics like what hue takes more moves, because i.e. I spend more time solving blueish or cyan gradients and would like to know if I have any improvements after playing for some time

Wonderful relaxing game, shame the recent update has added much longer ads. I'd happily pay for a fully unlocked version of the game without ads but you can only buy in game currency to unlock new levels.

It's a great game, however I switched phones and lost all my progress even after when signed into my Google play account. That is why I took one star away. As much as I love playing I am a little put off by losing my progress. My progress is on my old phone only even though both phones are on the same account. I don't know if this can be fixed but I would appreciate it greatly if someone could help me get my progress back.
This game is so calming and relaxing. Especially for someone with anxiety, this game really calms me down. Some levels are easy, some difficult, but that's why I love this unique game so much.

Beginning gameplay costs nothing and has no ads, but all levels after do. They cost an in game currency which you get an allotted amount each day, after that you have to watch ads or pay up. Ads play after every stage beaten after the first level and you must purchase in game currency to remove.  That being said, I downloaded this to help me calm down when I feel anxious, and it works great. Pretty colors and calming music give this app a relaxing feel that helps me take my mind of whatever I'm worrying about. I did pay to remove ads as those did end up ruining the mood that the rest of the app sets up.
Nice game to train your colour perception. But way too many ads in the game which is really annoying.
